name: SendEmail
description: This tool sends an given email to given receivers

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: The email addresses of receivers. If there are multiple receivers, use ";" to separate their addresses.

parameters.name: cc
parameters.description: The email addresses of the CC objects, if there are multiple CC objects, use ";" to separate their addresses. Can be empty (null), indicating no cc.

input.subject: Meeting Reminder
input.content: Don't forget our meeting tomorrow at 2pm.

example.output: The email has been sent successfully.
